```{r}
MCS_sdq_all <- rbind(MCS_no_diag,MCS_sdq_autism)
```

# z-test function

```{r}
calc_z_p_values <- function(est1, se1, est2, se2) {
  z_score <- (est1 - est2) / sqrt(se1^2 + se2^2)
  p_value <- 2 * (1 - pnorm(abs(z_score)))
  return(c(z_score, p_value))
}

```

# LGCM 
# Total
```{r}
library(lavaan)
mcs_agestr_ttl_male <- "
int =~ 1*BEBDTOT + 1*CEBDTOT + 1*DDDEBDTOT + 1*EEBDTOT + 1*FEBDTOT + 1*GEBDTOT
slp =~ 3*BEBDTOT + 5*CEBDTOT + 7*DDDEBDTOT + 11*EEBDTOT + 14*FEBDTOT + 17*GEBDTOT

# the parametres for slope reflect the designed ages at corresponding sweeps
"
mcs_agestr_ttl_fit_boy <- growth(mcs_agestr_ttl_male, data = MCS_sdq_all[MCS_sdq_all$Sex == "Male",], group = "grp_num",  missing = "fiml", estimator = "ml", fixed.x = F)
summary(mcs_agestr_ttl_fit_boy)
```

# Z test of difference of intercept and slope between groups
## Total
```{r}
male_ttl_early <- est_mcs_agestr_ttl_fit_boy %>% filter(lhs %in% c("int","slp") & group == 3) %>% select(lhs,est,se)
male_ttl_late <- est_mcs_agestr_ttl_fit_boy %>% filter(lhs %in% c("int","slp")& group == 2) %>% select(lhs,est,se)
male_int_ttl_mean_early <- male_ttl_early[1,"est"]
male_int_ttl_se_early <- male_ttl_early[1,"se"]
male_slp_ttl_mean_early <- male_ttl_early[2,"est"]
male_slp_ttl_se_early <- male_ttl_early[2,"se"]
male_int_ttl_mean_late <- male_ttl_late[1,"est"]
male_int_ttl_se_late <- male_ttl_late[1,"se"]
male_slp_ttl_mean_late <- male_ttl_late[2,"est"]
male_slp_ttl_se_late <- male_ttl_late[2,"se"]

male_ttl_int <- calc_z_p_values(male_int_ttl_mean_early,male_int_ttl_se_early,male_int_ttl_mean_late,male_int_ttl_se_late)

male_ttl_slp <- calc_z_p_values(male_slp_ttl_mean_early,male_slp_ttl_se_early,male_slp_ttl_mean_late,male_slp_ttl_se_late)

male_ttl_int
male_ttl_slp
```

### GMM

```{r}
MCS_autism <- read.csv("/Users/zhangxinhe/Documents/who recieves a diagnosis/MCS/MCS_SDQ_autism.csv") # 188 in total
MCS_sdq_autism <- MCS_autism[,c(1:21,34:39,22:33,40:45)] 
MCS_sdq_autism <- dplyr::mutate(MCS_sdq_autism, numericID = row_number())
MCS_sdq_autism_male <- MCS_sdq_autism[MCS_sdq_autism$Sex == "Male",]
MCS_sdq_autism_male <- MCS_sdq_autism_male %>%
  dplyr::mutate(diag.age = case_when(
    ASD.Diagnosis.Age == "at W3" ~ 5,
    ASD.Diagnosis.Age == "at W4" ~ 7,
    ASD.Diagnosis.Age == "at W5" ~ 11,
    ASD.Diagnosis.Age == "at W6" ~ 14)
    )
MCS_autism_wide_sdq_total_m <- MCS_sdq_autism_male[,c("numericID","MCSID","diag.age","BEBDTOT","CEBDTOT", "DDDEBDTOT" ,"EEBDTOT","FEBDTOT","GEBDTOT")]
MCS_autism_long_sdq_total_m <- melt(setDT(MCS_autism_wide_sdq_total_m), id.vars = c("numericID","MCSID","diag.age"), variable.name = "sweep")
MCS_autism_long_sdq_total_m <- MCS_autism_long_sdq_total_m %>%
  dplyr::mutate(Sweep = case_when(
    sweep == "BEBDTOT" ~ 2,
    sweep == "CEBDTOT" ~ 3,
    sweep == "DDDEBDTOT" ~ 4,
    sweep == "EEBDTOT" ~ 5,
    sweep == "FEBDTOT" ~ 6,
    sweep == "GEBDTOT" ~ 7)
    ) %>% dplyr::mutate(Sweep.age = case_when(
    sweep == "BEBDTOT" ~ 3,
    sweep == "CEBDTOT" ~ 5,
    sweep == "DDDEBDTOT" ~ 7,
    sweep == "EEBDTOT" ~ 11,
    sweep == "FEBDTOT" ~ 14,
    sweep == "GEBDTOT" ~ 17)
    )

MCS_autism_long_sdq_emo_m <- melt(setDT(MCS_autism_wide_sdq_emo_m), id.vars = c("numericID","MCSID","diag.age"), variable.name = "sweep")
MCS_autism_long_sdq_emo_m <- MCS_autism_long_sdq_emo_m %>%
  dplyr::mutate(Sweep = case_when(
    sweep == "BEMOTION" ~ 2,
    sweep == "CEMOTION" ~ 3,
    sweep == "DDEMOTION" ~ 4,
    sweep == "EEMOTION" ~ 5,
    sweep == "FEMOTION" ~ 6,
    sweep == "GEMOTION" ~ 7)
    ) %>%
  dplyr::mutate(Sweep.age = case_when(
    sweep == "BEMOTION" ~ 3,
    sweep == "CEMOTION" ~ 5,
    sweep == "DDEMOTION" ~ 7,
    sweep == "EEMOTION" ~ 11,
    sweep == "FEMOTION" ~ 14,
    sweep == "GEMOTION" ~ 17)
    ) 


MCS_autism_wide_sdq_con_m <- MCS_sdq_autism_male[,c("numericID","MCSID","diag.age","BCONDUCT","CCONDUCT","DDCONDUCT","ECONDUCT","FCONDUCT","GCONDUCT")]
MCS_autism_long_sdq_con_m <- melt(setDT(MCS_autism_wide_sdq_con_m), id.vars = c("numericID","MCSID","diag.age"), variable.name = "sweep")
MCS_autism_long_sdq_con_m <- MCS_autism_long_sdq_con_m %>%
  dplyr::mutate(Sweep = case_when(
    sweep == "BCONDUCT" ~ 2,
    sweep == "CCONDUCT" ~ 3,

MCS_autism_wide_sdq_hyp_m <- MCS_sdq_autism_male[,c("numericID","MCSID","diag.age","BHYPER","CHYPER","DDHYPER","EHYPER","FHYPER","GHYPER")]
MCS_autism_long_sdq_hyp_m <- melt(setDT(MCS_autism_wide_sdq_hyp_m), id.vars = c("numericID","MCSID","diag.age"), variable.name = "sweep")
MCS_autism_long_sdq_hyp_m <- MCS_autism_long_sdq_hyp_m %>%
  dplyr::mutate(Sweep = case_when(
    sweep == "BHYPER" ~ 2,
    sweep == "CHYPER" ~ 3,
    sweep == "DDHYPER" ~ 4,
    sweep == "EHYPER" ~ 5,
    sweep == "FHYPER" ~ 6,
    sweep == "GHYPER" ~ 7)
    ) %>%
  dplyr::mutate(Sweep.age = case_when(
    sweep == "BHYPER" ~ 3,
    sweep == "CHYPER" ~ 5,
    sweep == "DDHYPER" ~ 7,
    sweep == "EHYPER" ~ 11,
    sweep == "FHYPER" ~ 14,
    sweep == "GHYPER" ~ 17)
    ) 



MCS_autism_wide_sdq_peer_m <- MCS_sdq_autism_male[,c("numericID","MCSID","diag.age","BPEER","CPEER","DDPEER","EPEER","FPEER","GPEER")]
MCS_autism_long_sdq_peer_m <- melt(setDT(MCS_autism_wide_sdq_peer_m), id.vars = c("numericID","MCSID","diag.age"), variable.name = "sweep")
MCS_autism_long_sdq_peer_m <- MCS_autism_long_sdq_peer_m %>%
  dplyr::mutate(Sweep = case_when(
    sweep == "BPEER" ~ 2,
    sweep == "CPEER" ~ 3,
    sweep == "DDPEER" ~ 4,
    sweep == "EPEER" ~ 5,
    sweep == "FPEER" ~ 6,
    sweep == "GPEER" ~ 7)
    )%>%
  dplyr::mutate(Sweep.age = case_when(
    sweep == "BPEER" ~ 3,
    sweep == "CPEER" ~ 5,
    sweep == "DDPEER" ~ 7,
    sweep == "EPEER" ~ 11,
    sweep == "FPEER" ~ 14,
    sweep == "GPEER" ~ 17)
    ) 



MCS_autism_wide_sdq_pro_m <- MCS_sdq_autism_male[,c("numericID","MCSID","diag.age","BPROSOC","CPROSOC","DDPROSOC","EPROSOC","FPROSOC","GPROSOC")]
MCS_autism_long_sdq_pro_m <- melt(setDT(MCS_autism_wide_sdq_pro_m), id.vars = c("numericID","MCSID","diag.age"), variable.name = "sweep")

  dplyr::mutate(Sweep = case_when(

    sweep == "CPROSOC" ~ 3,
    sweep == "DDPROSOC" ~ 4,
    sweep == "EPROSOC" ~ 5,
    sweep == "FPROSOC" ~ 6,
    sweep == "GPROSOC" ~ 7)
    )%>%
  dplyr::mutate(Sweep.age = case_when(
    sweep == "BPROSOC" ~ 3,
    sweep == "CPROSOC" ~ 5,
    sweep == "DDPROSOC" ~ 7,
    sweep == "EPROSOC" ~ 11,
    sweep == "FPROSOC" ~ 14,
    sweep == "GPROSOC" ~ 17)
    ) 

age <- c("3","5","7","11","14","17")
```

```{r}

mcs_ttl_gmm1_m <- hlme(value ~ Sweep, subject = "numericID", random=~1, ng = 1, data =
MCS_autism_long_sdq_total_m)
summary(mcs_ttl_gmm1_m)


mcs_ttl_gmm2_m <- hlme(value ~ Sweep, subject = "numericID", random=~1,
ng = 2, data = MCS_autism_long_sdq_total_m, mixture = ~ Sweep,
nwg=T, B = mcs_ttl_gmm1_m)
summary(mcs_ttl_gmm2_m)



mcs_ttl_gmm3_m <- hlme(value ~ Sweep, subject = "numericID", random=~1,
ng = 3, data = MCS_autism_long_sdq_total_m, mixture = ~ Sweep,
nwg=T, B = mcs_ttl_gmm1_m)
summary(mcs_ttl_gmm3_m)

mcs_ttl_gmm4_m <- hlme(value ~ Sweep, subject = "numericID", random=~1,
ng = 4, data = MCS_autism_long_sdq_total_m, mixture = ~ Sweep,
nwg=T, B = mcs_ttl_gmm1_m)
summary(mcs_ttl_gmm4_m)

# make a table with results for the 3 models:
fit_ind_m <- summarytable(mcs_ttl_gmm1_m, mcs_ttl_gmm2_m,mcs_ttl_gmm3_m,mcs_ttl_gmm4_m,which = c("AIC","BIC","SABIC","%class","entropy","npm","loglik"))
```


```{r}
mcs_age <- c("3","5","7","11","14","17")
MCS_autism_long_sdq_total_m$numericID <- as.character(MCS_autism_long_sdq_total_m$numericID)
mcs_ttl_people2_m <- as.data.frame(mcs_ttl_gmm2_m$pprob[,1:2])
MCS_autism_long_sdq_total_m$class <- factor(mcs_ttl_people2_m$class[sapply(MCS_autism_long_sdq_total_m$numericID, function(x) which(mcs_ttl_people2_m$numericID==x))])

MCS_autism_long_sdq_total_m <- MCS_autism_long_sdq_total_m %>% dplyr::mutate(Sweep.age = case_when(Sweep == 2 ~ 3,                                                                          Sweep == 3 ~ 5, Sweep == 4 ~ 7, Sweep == 5 ~ 11, Sweep == 6 ~ 14, Sweep == 7 ~ 17 ))

MCS_autism_long_sdq_total_m$Sweep.age <- as.numeric(MCS_autism_long_sdq_total_m$Sweep.age)


my_colors <- brewer.pal(12, "Paired")[c(4,10)]
p_mcs_ttl_gmm2_m <- ggplot(MCS_autism_long_sdq_total_m , aes(Sweep.age, value, group=numericID, colour=class)) + geom_line(size = 0.1) + geom_smooth(aes(group=class), method="loess", size=2, se=T)  + scale_y_continuous(limits = c(0,40)) + scale_x_continuous(breaks = as.numeric(mcs_age), labels = mcs_age) +scale_colour_manual(values = my_colors)+ labs(x="Age (years)",y="MCS SDQ Total Score-Males",colour="Latent Class") +theme_classic()+ theme(legend.position = "bottom") 


suppressWarnings(print(p_mcs_ttl_gmm2_m))

```
```{r}
my_colors_stack <- brewer.pal(12, "Paired")[c(4,10)]

legend_labels <- c("Class 1","Class 2")
strict_ttl_stack_m <- ggplot(MCS_autism_long_sdq_total_m,  aes(x = factor(diag.age), fill = class)) +geom_bar(position="fill") + scale_y_continuous(labels = scales::percent) +
  labs(x = "Diagnosis Age", y = "Percentage") + scale_fill_manual(values = my_colors_stack, labels = legend_labels, name = "Class")+
  theme_minimal() + theme(legend.position = "bottom")
```
